name: Draw Line: Jump
description:
"Draw Line: Jump" is a simple logic puzzle involving finding paths to connect dots in a grid.

HOW TO PLAY
• Pair up all the matching dots on the grid with single continuous lines.
• DOTs have to fall at the end of each line.
• LINEs can JUMP over each other on the tunnel.
• All the cells in the grid are filled.

FEATURES
• Over 1,000 free levels
• 10 different board sizes
• Free 5 hints, at the first game
• Colorful Dots and UI
• Musical Sound Effects
• Turns mode, No Time Limit
• Time Attack mode, another game in Puzzle
• Additional level packs available for purchase
• Share with friends through Facebook.
• Sync your progress with Facebook ID

SUPPORT UNIVERSAL APP
• Try to enjoy the game using various devices.

NOTES
• This app contains Ads banner and Interstitial ads.
• This app sells In-app Products.
